summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to execute an agreement with the Municipality of Metropolitan Seattle for financial and other assistance on the Household Hazardous Waste Collection project and accepting those funds when received to be deposited in the Solid Waste fund; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1989 Budget of the Seattle Engineering Department; and making reimbursable appropriations from the Engineering Department Operating and Solid Waste Funds therefor.
